snippet.title: Wonderbox: The Adventure Maker | Launch Trailer | Apple Arcade | iOS
snippet.description:
SUBSCRIBE TO THE WONDERBOX CHANNEL, TO STAY UPDATED: https://bit.ly/3uh3u3D
DOWNLOAD WONDERBOX: http://apple.co/-Wonderbox 

Welcome to Wonderbox: The Adventure Maker, an action-adventure game set in beautiful dioramas.
Wonderbox offers an ever-expanding universe that you can discover together with your friends and family. Play, share and create endless adventures right now, only on Apple Arcade.

Follow Us:
Twitter https://www.twitter.com/playwonderbox
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/playwonderbox/
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/PlayWonderbox
Tik Tok https://www.tiktok.com/@playwonderbox
Discord https://discord.com/invite/tVvaY3Seu5
#PlayWonderbox #TheAdventureMaker #AppleArcade
